Class BusInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • BusInfo

  • public class BusInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing information about buses. The methods contain checks for invalid queries, which will result in InvalidQueryExceptions being thrown, but it does not enforce "business rules" such as checking for dates in the past.

      • setAvailable

        public static void setAvailable(int bus,
                java.util.Date date,
                boolean available)
        Set the availability of a bus on a given date. Availability is modelled in the database as a list of dates on which a bus is not available, so you can use any date you like, including dates in the past.
